name: Hamilton AUTO 40MM
title: Hamilton AUTO 40MM
description: Rugged and edgy the Khaki Field Auto line of watches is perfect for the outdoorsmen. Each piece in the line has bold dials with brightly colored indexes and wearers have a choice of leather strap or stainless steel bracelets – each made for working hands. These watches are designed for the adventurous, active wearer.

name: Hamilton VIEWMATIC SKELETON
title: Hamilton VIEWMATIC SKELETON
description: Black is beautiful – graceful second hand. Sophistication has the upper hand with a flower cut into the mother of pearl dial to reveal the elaborately decorated H-20-S movement. The ultimate statement of brilliance is a diamond-set case comprising 68 gorgeous stones.

name: Hamilton BAGLEY QUARTZ
title: Hamilton BAGLEY QUARTZ
description: The Hamilton Bagley turns the inspiration of a 1939 classic into a must-have for the modern woman with an eye for elegance. A love of detail is evident in the watch’s domed, multi-level dial with a stamped central panel in a quilted effect.

name: Ladies+Pullover+L+S+Hood
title: Ladies Pullover L/S Hood
description: This is the perfect design tribute to the proud Hamilton history of being “The Watch of Railroad Accuracy” in the nineteenth century. Stunning looks with an industrial vibe house an H-10-S movement with 80 hours of power reserve. The open dial offers a great view of the “engine room” to show this intricate movement in action, with its beautiful skeletonization and luxury decoration.

name: Ladies+Sonoma+Hybrid+Knit+Jacket
title: Ladies Sonoma Hybrid Knit Jacket
description: Hamilton is raising the bar for its Pan Europ family with a brand new, highperformance automatic movement. The H-30, with its typical 80 hours of power reserve, is rooted in sporty design that is both chic and dynamic.

name: Ladies+Yerba+Knit+Quarter+Zip
title: Ladies Yerba Knit Quarter Zip
description: The signature of the Spirit of Liberty is uncompromising attention to detail, building a strong bridge from history to modernity. The Hamilton H-10 movement with 80 hours of power reserve and its exclusive decoration and skeletonized rotor add a contemporary feel to the traditional precision timekeeping.
